description:
A major intergalactic travel program has chosen Earth to spotlight, and Keroro helped them with the highlights!  There`s lots of reminiscing about previous episodes, especially those embarrassing Giroro, but Keroro seems to have something sneaky planned...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Frequent Appearance! Planet Andou`s Heaven
ケロロ 出没! アド星ック天国
